Package renderer.models_TP

Class Icosahedron

java.lang.Object
renderer.scene.Model
renderer.models_TP.Icosahedron
public class Icosahedron extends Model
Create a solid model of a regular icosahedron with its center at the origin, having edge length 

     4/(1+sqrt(5)) = 1.2361,
and with its vertices on a sphere of radius 

     4/(1+sqrt(5)) * sin(2Pi/5) = 1.1756.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regular_icosahedron

See Also:

  • Cube
  • Octahedron
  • Dodecahedron
